metadata.title: CVE-2023-33202 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Bouncy Castle for Java before 1.73 contains a potential Denial of Service(DoS) issue within the Bouncy Castle org.bouncycastle.openssl.PEMParserclass. This class parses OpenSSL PEM encoded streams containing X.509certificates, PKCS8 encoded keys, and PKCS7 objects. Parsing a file thathas crafted ASN.1 data through the PEMParser causes an OutOfMemoryError,which can enable a denial of service attack.

criterions.comment: bouncycastle package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
